# categoryOptions

**Instance Property**

The set of options associated with the current audio session category.

## Declaration

```swift
var categoryOptions: AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

You use category options to tailor the behavior of the active audio session category. See [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/CategoryOptions-swift.struct] for the supported values.

## Inspecting the category configuration

- **category**: The current audio session category.
- **availableCategories**: The audio session categories available on the current device.
- **AVAudioSession.Category**: Audio session category identifiers.
- **AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions**: Constants that specify optional audio behaviors.
